Name: UniFi-Poller
Overview:
[b]Collect ALL UniFi Controller, Device and Client Data - Export to InfluxDB or Prometheus.[/b]
    Visualize with Grafana using included dashboards![br]
    [b]IMPORTAT! ACTION REQUIRED![/b] As of UniFi Poller version 2 all of the
    environment variables and config file format changed.
    You must reconfigure this container after you upgrade![br]
    [b]READ THE INSTRUCTIONS![/b]
    [u][a href="https://github.com/unifi-poller/unifi-poller/wiki/Configuration"]https://github.com/unifi-poller/unifi-poller/wiki/Configuration[/a][/u][br]

Poller Debug Mode.Name: Poller Debug Mode
Poller Debug Mode.Description: Container Variable: UP_POLLER_DEBUG - Setting true includes more log output.

Poller Quiet Mode.Name: Poller Quiet Mode
Poller Quiet Mode.Description: Container Variable: UP_POLLER_QUIET - Setting true disables most log output.

UniFi 1st Controller Host URL.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Host URL
UniFi 1st Controller Host URL.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_URL - URL for UniFi controller.

UniFi 1st Controller Username.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Username
UniFi 1st Controller Username.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_USER - Username for UniFi Controller.

UniFi 1st Controller Password.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Password
UniFi 1st Controller Password.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_PASS - Password for UniFi Controller.

UniFi 1st Controller Save DPI.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save DPI
UniFi 1st Controller Save DPI.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_DPI - Poll and save deep packet inspection data. This is a lot of data, and it must be enabled on the controller.

UniFi 1st Controller Save IDS.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save IDS
UniFi 1st Controller Save IDS.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_IDS - Save intrusion detection data (InfluxDB only). This data does not contain graphable metrics.

UniFi 1st Controller Save Sites.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Save Sites
UniFi 1st Controller Save Sites.Description: Container Value: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SAVE_SITES - Set this to 'false' to save space and resources in InfluxDB. This data powers the Network Sites dashboard.

UniFi 1st Controller Poll Sites.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Poll Sites
UniFi 1st Controller Poll Sites.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_SITES_0 - List of sites to poll on controller, comma separated. Use cryptic ID values here; set to 'all' for all sites.

UniFi 1st Controller Verify SSL.Name: UniFi 1st Controller Verify SSL
UniFi 1st Controller Verify SSL.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_CONTROLLER_0_VERIFY_SSL - Enable this if you have a valid SSL cert on your controller.

InfluxDB Host URL.Name: InfluxDB Host URL
InfluxDB Host URL.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_URL - URL for InfluxDB. Not important if using Prometheus only.

InfluxDB Username.Name: InfluxDB Username
InfluxDB Username.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_USER - Username for InfluxDB. Usually unimportant because InfluxDB has no auth by default.

InfluxDB Password.Name: InfluxDB Password
InfluxDB Password.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_PASS - Password for InfluxDB (if required)

InfluxDB Database.Name: InfluxDB Database
InfluxDB Database.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_DB - InfluxDB database name. Create this first with: CREATE DATABASE unifi

InfluxDB Interval.Name: InfluxDB Interval
InfluxDB Interval.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_INTERVAL - Polling interval for saving metrics into InfluxDB. 30s-90s recommend.

InfluxDB Disabled.Name: InfluxDB Disabled
InfluxDB Disabled.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUXDB_DISABLE - Disable InfluxDB polling. Set this true if you only use Prometheus.

Prometheus Listener.Name: Prometheus Listener
Prometheus Listener.Description: Container Value: UP_PROMETHEUS_HTTP_LISTEN - IP and port poller listens on for HTTP Prometheus scrapes. Must be in 0.0.0.0:port format.

Prometheus Disabled.Name: Prometheus Disabled
Prometheus Disabled.Description: Container Variable: UP_PROMETHEUS_DISABLE - Disable Prometheus listener. Set true if you only use InfluxDB.
